forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High around 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High around 60F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming windy. Cloudy skies with periods of rain developing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early then becoming windy with rain developing later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Low 51F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. Windy. High 12C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. Windy. High 54F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 49F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 53F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers, with increasing winds in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds WNW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with increasing winds in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds WNW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening with clear skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening with clear skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low around 5C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 12C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 54F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 54F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 12C. NE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 54F. NE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 12C. SE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 54F. SE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.
